categories: Category:Enlisted stormtroopers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Forley was a Human male stormtrooper who was assigned to Jerec's fleet during the Galactic Civil War. In 5 ABY, he was the sergeant of Patrol 341, led by Lieutenant Aagon and containing Leeno. The patrol was destroyed on Ruusan by a collection of settlers led by Kyle Katarn, Jan Ors, and Grif Grawley. Forley was killed during the battle by an indigenous Bouncer.
